name: Stranded Eternity - Troika Game Jam Version
name_original: Stranded Eternity - Troika Game Jam Version
description:
Experience of the Jam: This was a unique experience. I'm not well-versed in this genre and after reviewing the many submissions that accrued over the duration of the jam, I quickly realized how little I understood of what was in store. Nonetheless, I decided that this was at minimum, an opportunity to learn and stimulate my imagination. Thus, I thank you all for that. I saw several different avenues of creativity in the submissions, and if possible I'd be willing to work with any of you to produce more Troika-related worlds in Stranded Eternity, as the potential seems only bounded by the limits of imagination.

Summary Of The Game: It's a fast paced rogue-like comprised of multiple worlds in which a variety of related creatures exist which can be experienced through a variety of game modes using unlockable characters.

Game-Jam Specific Version: 

1) New Troika-inspired world called World of Chance (for this version all other worlds have been removed). 
2) New game mode called Dice and Cards to pay homage to the genre, it's not always the game mode rolled, but it eventually turns up while playing.
3) New playable character (Dicer).

Note: This project is far from being considered "polished", it's still in an alpha stage, so there are bugs and things you might find out of place.
